_header: In a morning of May when meadows should spring
Note:
Cf. 4256. For a critical edition, see Fein (1998)
XFein, Susanna Greer. Moral Love Songs and Laments. Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 1998.
Title(s): The Quatrefoil of Love; The Four Leaves of the Truelove
_description: The Quatrefoil of Love — forty 13-line stanzas

BodAddA106.First Lines:
In a mornynge of may when medose schuld spryngeBlomes &
                    blossomes of bryght coloursAls I went by a well of my playngeThurght a
                    mery orchard byddyng myn owres…
BodAddA106.Last Lines:
…Als I went on my wayIn A mornynge of maywhen medouse
                    suld sprynge

BLAdd31042.First Lines: In a mornenyng of Maye when Medowes sall spryngBlomes & blossomis of brighte colours…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …Als I wente one my wayIn a mornynge of mayWhen medowes sall sprynge
BLAdd31042.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of the manuscript.
